title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: A Green Mythic Oozing Potential, Rocker Vehicle, Mindspring Merfolk  Aetherdrift MTG Spoilers
videos.description:
It's day three of Aetherdrift spoilers and today we get a Ooze-y green mythic, some spicy vehicles, a new Merfolk one-drop and more! Let's discuss!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtgggoldfish

More spoilers: https://www.mtgpreviews.com

0:00 Start
0:47 March of the World Ooze
5:35 Possession Engine
8:25 Mindspring Merfolk
11:29 Thopter Fabricator
15:13 Intimidation Tactics
16:46 Momentum Breaker
18:39 Commons and Uncommons

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Control, but It's Mono-Green  Against the Odds
videos.description:
Green is both the worst color in Standard and the worst control color in Magic. But could Mono-Green Control be the secret to Standard success? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/against-the-odds-control-but-it-s-mono-green-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/6858208#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/FGxC9
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/uMleP
